mapper.sql: id, `name`, parameter_id, branch_id, create_user_id, the_status, sort
mapper.select:
select s.* ,u.`name` as u_name from laky_organization_parameter_value s LEFT JOIN laky_organization_user u ON s.create_user_id = u.id and u.the_status!=0
where s.branch_id = #{branchId} AND s.the_status !=0 AND s.parameter_id =#{parameterId} ORDER BY sort
mapper.insert: insert into laky_organization_parameter_value (name, parameter_id, branch_id, create_user_id, the_status, sort) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{theStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,

mapper.update:
update laky_organization_parameter_value
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parameter_id = #{parameterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
the_status = #{theStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
